Indonesian: idhakim from Arabic ar????? – used in Malaysian to refer to judges, idmagistrat less common

Malaysian: zsmlelaki, zsmlaki-laki, zsmjantan (for animals, depending on the context, it can mean masculine or used as a derogatory term on men)
Indonesian: idlaki-laki, idpria, idlelaki, idjantan (on animals, used on men to describe masculinity)
idmatematika, idilmu hitung, idilmu hisab only used in Islamic text books
idmiliter (from French frmilitaire through Dutch nlmilitair), idkemiliteran, idketentaraan
